Kakšen je pravi partner za vašo osebnost?
Partnerjev ne izbiramo le na podlagi videza, ampak tudi značaja. Avanturisti se bodo najbolje razumeli z opazovalci.
07 Nov 2019, 15:44 by Katarina Golob



GETTY IMAGES/ISTOCKPHOTOZvesti tip osebnosti potrebuje nekoga, ki je romantičen in stvaren. FOTOGRAFIJi: GULIVER/GETTY IMAGES



GETTY IMAGES/ISTOCKPHOTOPartnerja izbiramo tudi na podlagi svojega značaja.



Avanturisti se radi zabavajo in imajo več partnerjev, včasih celo istočasno.


Ljudje imamo različne značaje in osebnosti, to pa močno vpliva na izbor partnerja. Na podlagi svoje osebnosti lahko vidite, kakšen partner vam ustreza.
Zvesti tip osebnosti
To so ljudje, ki ne marajo laži in vedno govorijo resnico, partnerju so zelo privrženi, ne marajo sprememb in so poosebljenje zvestobe. Kljub temu imajo težavo z zaupanjem, zato potrebujejo nekoga, ki je romantičen in hkrati dovolj stvaren, da jim bo s svojimi dejanji dokazal nasprotno – da je zaupanje treba imeti, ko si ga nekdo zasluži.
Opazovalci
Ne želijo se izpostavljati, raje ob strani opazujejo dogajanje in si mislijo svoje, ne da bi odprli usta. Pogosto so samotarji, raje poslušajo kot govorijo, zato morda delujejo nedostopno, a v njih v resnici tli želja po avanturi, po nekom, ki bo prebudil njihov ogenj in jih osvobodil.
Za perfekcioniste bo najboljša izbira partner, ki jih bo naučil na življenje gledati z razdalje ter z več humorja.
PerfekcionistiTežijo k idealom, ki ne obstajajo, obremenjujejo se z malenkostmi, namesto da bi uživali v tem, kar jim življenje lepega ponuja. Potrebujejo nekoga, ki bo pregnal njihovo slabo vest in jih naučil na življenje gledati z razdalje ter z več humorja.
Asistenti
Vedno najprej pomislijo na druge, preden naredijo kar koli od tega, kar si želijo sami, zato ni čudno, da pogosto ostanejo nezadovoljeni. Menijo, da bodo s svojim trudom pridobili ljubezen in pozornost, partnerja imajo za avtoriteto, skoraj starše, in pri njem ljubijo in občudujejo pogum, s katerim živi življenje. To jim je lahko v pomoč, da se naučijo, kako več misliti samo nase in se manj ukvarjati z drugimi.
Avanturisti
Radi bi vse in nič, predvsem pa za nič na svetu ne bi zamenjali svoje svobode. Radi se zabavajo in imajo več partnerjev, včasih celo istočasno, s tem se ne obremenjujejo. Sovražijo avtoriteto, sami sebi so dovolj, zato so izjemno karizmatični. Partnerja lahko najdejo v skupini opazovalcev, saj drug drugega dopolnjujejo.

What is the right partner for your personality?
We choose partners not only based on appearance but also character. Adventurers will get along best with observers.
07 Nov 2019, 15:44 by Katarina Golob



GETTY IMAGES / ISTOCKPHOTOFair personality type needs someone who is romantic and creative. PHOTOS: GULIVER / GETTY IMAGES



We also choose GETTY IMAGES / ISTOCKPHOTOPartners based on their character.



Adventurers like to have fun and have multiple partners, sometimes even at the same time.


We humans have different characters and personalities, and this greatly influences the choice of a partner. Based on your personality, you can see which partner is right for you.
Faithful personality type
These are people who do not like lies and always tell the truth, they are very loyal to their partner, they do not like change and they are a personification of loyalty. Nevertheless, they have a problem with trust, so they need someone who is romantic and creative enough to prove to them the opposite through their actions - that trust should be had when someone deserves it.
Observers
They do not want to be exposed, they prefer to watch things happen by their side and think their own without opening their mouths. Often, they are loners, preferring to listen to talk, so they may seem inaccessible, but in them, in fact, a desire for adventure, for someone who will awaken their fire and set them free.
For the perfectionist, the best choice will be the partner who will teach them to look at life from a distance and with more humor.
Perfectionists are pursuing ideals that do not exist, burdening themselves with the little things, rather than enjoying what the life of the beautiful offers them. They need someone to get over their bad conscience and teach them to look at life from a distance and with more humor.
Assistants
They always think of others first before they do any of what they want on their own, so it's no wonder that they often remain dissatisfied. They think that through their efforts they will gain love and attention, they have partners as authority, almost parents, and they love and admire the courage with which they live their lives. This can help them to learn how to think more about themselves and deal less with others.
Adventurers
We would love everything and nothing, but above all for nothing in the world we would not exchange our freedom. They like to have fun and have multiple partners, sometimes even at the same time, without burdening themselves. They hate authority, they are enough for themselves, so they are extremely charismatic. They can find partners in the observer group as they complement each other.
